name: Spacing Out with R-Capek
description:
Synopsis

You're a brave astronaut who's been sent out to fix problems on the exterior of your spaceship! Work with R-Capek, your trusty robot partner, to take down high-velocity space junk while you're repairing problem areas.  By fixing as many areas as possible and taking down space junk, points are added to your score. Can you earn the highest score? There's only one way to find out!

This game is a fun demonstration of the potential future symbiotic relationship between humans and robots.  It can be played solo or with two people at the same keyboard.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Source

Reference: MONI-07B
